Verses: 1 padhinoraam Varusham Mudhalaanthedhiyile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Theeruvaanadhu Erusalemukku Virodhamaaga, Aa Aa, Janasadhalangalin Olimugavaasalaayirundha Nagari Idikkappattadhendrum Ennidamaaga, Ellaam Puranduvarum, Adhu Paazhaakkappattirukka Naan Nirappappaduven Endrum Sollugirapadiyinaal,

3 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Theeruve Idho, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Varugiren; Samuththiram Than Alaigalai Ezhumbivarappannugira Vannamaai Naan Anegam Jaadhigalai Unakku Virodhamaaga, Ezhumbi Varappannuven.
4 avargal Theeruvin Madhilgalai Azhiththu, Adhin Koththalangalai Idiththuppoduvaargal; Naan Adhin Mannum Adhil Iraadhapadikku Vilakkippottu, Adhai Verum Paaraiyaakkividuven.
5 adhu Valaigalai Virikkira Idamaaga Samuththiraththin Naduvile Irukkum; Naan Idhai Sonnen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar; Adhu Jaadhigalukkuk Kollaiyaagum.
6 veliyil Irukkira Adhin Kumaaraththigalo Pattayaththaal Kondrupodappaduvaargal; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.

7 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho Naan Raajaadhiraajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Ennum Baabilon Raajaavai Vadakkeyirundhu Kudhiraigalodum Radhangalodum Kudhiraiveerarodum Koottaththaarodum Thiralaana Janaththodum Theeruvukku Virodhamaaga Varappannuven.
8 avan Veliyil Irukkira Un Kumaaraththigalaip Pattayaththinaalkondru, Unakku Virodhamaagak Koththalangalaik Katti Unakku Virodhamaaga Anaipottu, Unakku Virodhamaagak Kedayangalai Eduththu,
9 un Madhilgalai Idikkira Yandhirangalai Edhire Vaiththu, Than Kattaippaaraigalaal Un Koththalangalai Idiththuppoduvaan.

10 avan Kudhiraigalin Eraalaththinaal Thool Ezhumbi Unnai Moodum; Idiththuth Thirappaakkappatta Pattanaththil Pravesikkum Vannamaaga, Avan Un Vaasalgalukkul Pravesikkaiyil, Kudhiraiveerarum Vandilgalum Radhangalum Iraigira Saththaththile Un Madhilgal Adhirum.
11 than Kudhiraigalin Kulambugalinaal Un Veedhigalaiyellaam Midhippaan; Un Janaththaip Pattayaththinaal Kondrupoduvaan; Un Balamaana Thoongal Tharaiyil Vizhundhupogum.

12 avargal Un Aasthiyaik Kollaiyittu, Un Sarakkugalai Sooraiyaadi, Un Madhilgalai Idiththu, Unakku Viruppamaana Veedugalai Azhiththu, Un Kallugalaiyum Un Marangalaiyum Un Mannaiyum Kadalin Naduvile Pottuviduvaargal.
13 un Paattugalin Saththaththai Oyappannuven; Un Suramandalangalin Saththam Inik Ketkappaduvadhillai.
14 unnai Verum Paaraiyaakkividuven; Nee Valaigalai Virikkira Sthalamaayiruppaai; Inik Kattappadaai; Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.
15 theeruvukkuk Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal: Kaayampattavargal Alarumpodhum, Un Naduvil Sangaaram Nadakkumpodhum, Nee Vizhugira Saththaththinaal Theevugal Adhiraadho?

16 kadalarasar Ellaarum Thangal Singaasanangalaivittu Irangi; Thangal Saalvaigalaik Kazhatri, Thangal Siththiraththaiyaaladaigalai Urindhupoduvaargal; Nadukkame Avargal Udaiyaagum; Tharaiyile Utkaarndhu, Nimishandhorum Thaththaliththu, Unnimiththam Bramippaargal.

17 avargal Unnimiththam Pulambi, Unnaik Kuriththu: Kadal Sanjaarigal Kudiyirundha Pugazhppetra Nagariye, Aiyo! Unnil Thanginavargalukkellaam Bayamundaakkina Un Kudigalodunkooda Samuththiraththile Balaththirundha Nee Azhindhuponaayo!
18 nee Vizhum Naalil Theevugal Thaththalikkum; Nee Agandrupogumpodhu Samuththiraththilulla Theevugal Kalangum Enbaargal.

19 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Naan Unnaik Kudiyillaadha, Nagarangalaippolap Paazhaana Nagaramaakkumpodhum, Migundha Thanneergal Unnai Moodaththakkadhaai Naan Unmel Samuththiraththai Varappannumpodhum,

20 poorvakaalaththu Janaththandakkuk Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargalode Naan Unnai Irangappannuven; Nee Kudiyeraadhirukkumpadi Poorvakaalamudharkondu Paazhaayirukkira Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalile Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargalodekooda Naan Unnaith Thangiyirukkappannuven; Jeevanullorudaiya Dhesaththilo Magimai Vilanga Seyven.
21 unnai Magaa Bayangaramaaga Vaippen; Ini Nee Irukkamaattaai; Nee Thedappattaalum Ini Endraikkum Kaanappadamaattaai Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar Endraar.
